citeinfo.origin: John R. Borchert Map Library, University of Minnesota and Minnesota Department of Natural Resources (MNDNR)
citeinfo.title: Minnesota Historical Aerial Photographs Online (MHAPO)

descript.abstract:
The points in this dataset represent the approximate geographic location of the centroids for scanned, non-georeferenced air photos that were captured between 1923 and 2007 and are freely available via the John R. Borchert Map Library and the Minnesota Department of Natural Resources.
The images were captured by a variety of government entities to address a wide range of applications. Images were scanned at resolutions ranging from 150 to 1200DPI. The collection includea a mixture of black & white, true color and infrared photographs. Various image collects were taken at a range of flight heights depending on the year and purpose of the collect.
descript.purpose: This point index can be used for spatial and temporal queries and subsequent retrieval of the scanned airphotos that are available on-line from the John R. Borchert Map Library and MNDNR. The atribute table includes a web link for each image centroid to corresponding online airphoto download page.

timeperd.current: Time Period of Content date indicates the date which the user can be confident of accuracy and completeness of the dataset.

theme.themekey: imageryBaseMapsEarthCover, Historic Air Photos, Imagery, Index,

citeinfo.title: MNDNR also has an online web-app that allows you to interactively click on these centroids and download the photographs. The URL for that web page is: http://www.dnr.state.mn.us/maps/landview/index.html

cntaddr.address: 309 19th Ave S, S76 O Meredith Wilson Library

dataqual.complete: Complete over the area of the State of Minnesota

horizpa.horizpar: Points represent the approximate centroid of the scanned air photo as interpreted from index maps, U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) and Farm Service Agncy (FSA) Digital orthophoto quadrangles (DOQs) as well as other referenced products.

attracc.attraccr: The attributes have been checked for accuracy vial manual and automated methods. Corrections are made as we become aware of them. Feel free to contact us if you find an error in the data.

procstep.procdesc: This data combines aerial photograph holdings of the MNDNR and the John R. Borchert Map Library at the University of Minnesota.
